text: ٱلَّذِىٓ أَحَلَّنَا دَارَ ٱلْمُقَامَةِ مِن فَضْلِهِۦ لَا يَمَسُّنَا فِيهَا نَصَبٌ وَلَا يَمَسُّنَا فِيهَا لُغُوبٌ

translation.en.sahih: He who has settled us in the home of duration out of His bounty. There touches us not in it any fatigue, and there touches us not in it weariness [of mind]."
translation.id.indonesian: Yang menempatkan kami dalam tempat yang kekal (surga) dari karunia-Nya; didalamnya kami tiada merasa lelah dan tiada pula merasa lesu".
